header.author: John Trusler
header.title: An Easy Way to Prolong Life, By a Little Attention to What we Eat and Drink: containing, A Chemical Analysis, or, an Enquiry into the Nature and Properties, of all Kinds of Food; how far they are wholesome, and agree with different Constitutions: with Some Directions respecting our Way of Living. Collected from the Authorities of some of our Ablest Physicians. By a Medical Gentleman.
